notes: Exhaustive search for N=2 optimal configuration. Searched all angles from 0째 to 180째 in 0.5째 increments, then fine-tuned in 0.01째 increments. For each angle, optimized positions using Nelder-Mead with 16 starting points. Result: Current N=2 solution (score=0.450597) is BETTER than the best found through exhaustive search (score=0.450781).
